title: Client keeps freezing during queue
body: this is happening at least once a day where my client freezes during pick phase and i keep having to wait out these shitty delays that are 30 fkn minutes long, I've recently been using a voice changer to japanese and thats the only cause i can think of. Please help

replies.body: We don't support third party programs or mods, so I'm not really sure how to help with this other than suggest that you remove the program.  The culprit may be a result of a recent Windows 10 update though, and not the voice changer.  If  you have Windows 10 and recently updated, disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was auto enabled and causing freezing issues.  Hope that helps!
